description:
Join Eva and her family as they take
a cruise on a ship following the same
path as the ill-fated Titanic. After
wearing her grandmotherâ€™s necklace,
Eva starts to experience flashbacks
and finds herself onboard the Titanic,
not as herself, but as her beloved
grandmother. Should she try and stop
the Titanic from colliding with the
iceberg and change the course of
history forever? And, if she does
prevent the disaster, what impact does
it have on the future and ultimately
the safety of her own family! Test your
hidden-object and logic skills in this
tense and exciting adventure game!
name:
Secrets of the Titanic
1912-2012
